description: Details required by Condition 3 (Secure Cycle Parking) and Condition 4 (Enclosures and Screened Facilities of Storage/Recycling Containers and Wheeled Refuse Bins) of Planning Permission 19/01840/FUL (Change of use of a 6-Bedroom House in Multiple Occupation (C4) to an 8-Bedroom House in Multiple Occupation (Sui Generis).  No external or internal alterations required.)
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are discharged.

The assessment of this application is been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings. If it transpires that the drawings submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
Please make a payment of Â£145, this can either be paid online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service team on 020 8547 5002

Inspection:Site inspection carried out in person on 30/11/2023.Assessment:Given the substantial lean of both trees, additional works should be permitted to reduce the weighting over the neighbours property.Recommendation:Approve.
